cards.rules_text: When Astral Pathfinder enters, look at the top three cards of your library, then you may reveal a creature card with mana value 3 or less from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
cards.notes: Slot 1‎ White‎ Uncommon‎ Creature (Any MV)

cards.rules_text:
Flying
[i]Threshold[/i] — Whenever Stormborn Griffin enters or attacks, surveil 1. If there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Stormborn Griffin.
cards.notes: Slot 7‎ Blue‎ Uncommon‎ Creature (Any MV)

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of each end step, if you lost 3 or more life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Forbidding Outsider.
Forbidding Outsider has lifelink as long as it has power 4 or greater.
cards.notes: Slot 13‎ Black‎ Uncommon‎ Creature (Any MV)

cards.rules_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may discard a noncreature card. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Worldseeking Existence.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Expansion never ceases, even in other worlds.[/i]
cards.notes: Slot 19‎ Red‎ Uncommon‎ Creature (Any MV)

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked with a creature with power 4 or greater this turn, draw a card.
{3}{G}: Double target creature's power until end of turn.
cards.notes: Slot 25‎ Green‎ Uncommon‎ Creature (Any MV)

cards.rules_text:
When Perennial Journey enters, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
Creature tokens you control get +1/+0.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The real forever is the friends we made along the way.[/i]
cards.notes: Slot 2‎ White‎ Uncommon‎ Noncreature (Any MV)

cards.rules_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
cards.notes: Slot 8‎ Blue‎ Uncommon‎ Noncreature (Any MV)

cards.rules_text:
Mill two cards, then each opponent loses 1 life for each card put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn.
Memory {3}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by paying its memory cost and discarding a card. Then exile it.)[/i]
cards.notes: Slot 14‎ Black‎ Uncommon‎ Noncreature (Any MV)

cards.rules_text:
Exile the top X cards of your library, where X was the amount of mana spent to cast Rite of Release. You may play them during your next turn.
Reprocess {X}{R}{R} [i](Cast a copy of this from your graveyard by exiling it and paying {X}{R}{R}. Spend only mana from differently named sources this way.)[/i]
cards.notes: Slot 20‎ Red‎ Uncommon‎ Noncreature (Any MV)

cards.rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast One To Many, sacrifice a creature.
Put X +1/+1 counters on each creature you control, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.
cards.notes: Slot 26‎ Green‎ Uncommon‎ Noncreature (Any MV)

cards.rules_text:
Whenever one or more enchantments you control enter for the first time each turn, create a 1/1 white Avatar creature token.
As long as you control three or more creatures, Enlightened Recluse gets +1/+2 and has vigilance.
cards.notes: Slot 3‎ White‎ Rare or Mythic‎ Creature (MV 1-3)

cards.rules_text:
Whenever you cast an instant spell or a spell with flash, surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
As long as there are five or more instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard, Starlight Wayfarer gets +2/+1 and has flying.
cards.notes: Slot 9‎ Blue‎ Rare or Mythic‎ Creature (MV 1-3)

cards.rules_text:
Whenever an opponent loses life for the first time each turn, surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
As long as there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, Nightfall Voyager gets +2/+0 and has menace.
cards.notes: Slot 15‎ Black‎ Rare or Mythic‎ Creature (MV 1-3)

cards.rules_text:
Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, Chained Terror deals 1 damage to each opponent.
As long as an opponent has lost 3 or more life this turn, Chained Terror gets +2/+2.
cards.notes: Slot 21‎ Red‎ Rare or Mythic‎ Creature (MV 1-3)

cards.rules_text:
Whenever you cast a creature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Deepgrowth Wraith.
As long as there are three or more counters on Deepgrowth Wraith, it has trample.
cards.notes: Slot 27‎ Green‎ Rare or Mythic‎ Creature (MV 1-3)

cards.rules_text:
Vigilance
Embodiment of Radiance gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control.
At the beginning of your end step, create a 1/1 white Avatar creature token.

cards.rules_text:
Menace
Embodiment of Fear gets +1/+1 for each card in your graveyard.
At the beginning of your end step, mill three cards.
cards.notes: Slot 16‎ Black‎ Rare or Mythic‎ Creature (MV 4+)

cards.rules_text:
Haste
Embodiment of Wrath gets +1/+1 for each noncreature, nonland permanent you control.
At the beginning of your end step, create a treasure token.
cards.notes: Slot 22‎ Red‎ Rare or Mythic‎ Creature (MV 4+)

cards.rules_text:
Trample
Embodiment of Strength gets +1/+1 for each land you control.
At the beginning of your end step, search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.rules_text: Exile up to two target nonland permanents you control, then return up to one of them to your hand and return the other to the battlefield.

cards.rules_text:
Skywatching costs {1} less to cast if you've cast another noncreature spell this turn.
Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

As an additional cost to cast Devoured by the Boundless, pay X life.
Put X -1/-1 counters on target creature.

cards.rules_text:
Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is that creature's power.

cards.rules_text: At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice an enchantment. If you do, search your library or graveyard for another enchantment card with mana value 1 greater than the sacrificed enchantment's mana value, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
cards.notes: Slot 6‎ White‎ Rare or Mythic‎ Noncreature (MV 4+)

cards.rules_text:
When Moonlit Wishes enters, if you cast it, shuffle your hand and graveyard into your library, then draw seven cards.
At the beginning of each end step, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying if you drew two or more cards this turn.
cards.notes: Slot 12‎ Blue‎ Rare or Mythic‎ Noncreature (MV 4+)

cards.rules_text:
When Twilight's Dawn enters, if you cast it, each creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
Whenever a creature dies, its controller loses 1 life.
cards.notes: Slot 18‎ Black‎ Rare or Mythic‎ Noncreature (MV 4+)

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of each end step, Divine Inferno deals 1 damage to each opponent for each spell they cast this turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

cards.rules_text: Once each turn, when one or more other permanents enter under your control, you may create a token that's a copy of each of them.

cards.rules_text:

cards.rules_text: Destroy target creature if it has mana value 3 or less or you have seven or more cards in your graveyard.

[i]“The gods have let darkness fester for far too long. It's time someone put it to use.”
—Kalad, Darkoli Outcast[/i]

cards.rules_text:

cards.rules_text:

cards.rules_text:
When Blue-Flame Bearer enters, put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target noncreature permanent. It becomes a creature in addition to its other types.
When Blue-Flame Bearer dies, it deals 2 damage to any target.
